name: Woodland Tomb
description:
Local legend says there's a forgotten graveyard in the forest where lost souls are drawn. You've heard stories that if you help the spirits move on, you'll be rewarded with the thing you most desire. Magical things happen in the forest at night, but dangerous things too. 

You must be back safely at camp before sunset each night. Luckily, you can still move things around the forest and set up spells during the day. Inspect clues on objects, pay attention to patterns, and set up your items in the right spot and at night you'll progress towards your goal. 

Play time is approximately 30 minutes.

Controls

  • Navigate with WASD or Arrow keys.
  • Press E to interact with items. 
  • Click on 'X' to drop an item from your inventory.
